SELECT t.right_id as "rightId" ,t.pid as "pid" ,t.right_name as "rightName" ,t.show_order as "showOrder" ,t.right_url as "rightUrl" ,right_type as "rightType" ,t.remark as "remark" ,t.logo_url as "logoUrl" ,t.is_enable as "isEnable"

mapper.delete: DELETE FROM t_sys_right WHERE 1=1 AND right_id=#{rightId}
mapper.select: SELECT t.right_id as "rightId" ,t.pid as "pid" ,t.right_name as "rightName" ,t.show_order as "showOrder" ,t.right_url as "rightUrl" ,t.right_type as "rightType" ,t.remark as "remark" ,d.name as "typeName" ,t.logo_url as "logoUrl" ,t.is_enable as "isEnable" FROM t_sys_right t left join t_sys_dict d on d.code = t.right_type WHERE 1=1 and d.type="RIGHT_TYPE" AND right_id=#{rightId} AND pid=#{pid} AND right_name like '%${rightName}%' AND show_order=#{showOrder} AND right_url=#{rightUrl} AND right_type=#{rightType} AND remark=#{remark} order by t.show_order, t.right_id
